name: fslmaths.fsl
description: FSLmaths: part of FMRIB Software Library (FSL) for manipulating images via various mathematical operations.

inputs.description: First input image for fslmaths operations.
inputs.name: First Input

inputs.description: Set datatype for calculations, e.g., char, short, int, float, double.
inputs.name: Datatype

inputs.description: Operations and inputs to be applied on the first image.
inputs.name: Operations and Inputs

inputs.description: Set output datatype, defaults to original image datatype.
inputs.name: Output Datatype

output-files.description: The resultant output image after applying the specified operations.
output-files.name: Output File

author: FreeSurfer Developers
